name: little man's big day
description:
on a completely normal day, in the middle of nowhere, a little guy goes works his job at the gas station. this game is still in development, and is more of a tech demo than anything.

keyboard controls

  • WASD to move
  • Left Shift to sprint
  • E to interact

controller controls

  • Left Stick or DPAD to move
  • X to sprint
  • A to interact
